name: Alt+F4 (ChooseNamer, Gewinner, Nicole-Fox, ChernoGop)
description:
Homework.exe? That seems odd.. I wonder what happens when I open that file..

Oh no! Looks like the file was actually a virus,  which keeps opening new windows. If that was not enough, these windows don't seem to have a close button? Perhaps solving the puzzles will help.

Test your speed, memory and patience with this fun game to beat this nasty virus!
